body.p:
Morgan Ky Sept 17th/ 61
Hon Gov Magoffin
I herein send you My resignation as Brevel Second Lieutenant of the Hays Rangers of Pendleton Co to take effect on & after the 17th inst"

Respectfuly Yours
B R Henry
Accepted
